title: URW Palladio Hot for Free Download
content:
Where can you get URW Palladio Hot for free?

宀
author: 386sky

comments.content: Why would you ask a question like that here on Typophile?

\> Where can you get URW Palladio Hot for free?

As clearly stated in red type on page 4 of the documentation

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/fonts/pahotman.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20121129140305/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/fonts/pahotman.pdf "http://www.sanskritweb.net/fonts/pahotman.pdf")

**It is only available to my friends and colleagues.**

Palladio HOT was never available to the general public.
Can you mail the URW Palladio Hot font into [removed by Moderator]?

**Urgent Note to Administrators of Typophile**

Please remove above email address added by spam producer 386sky,  
so that I do not get nasty spam emails.
I'd say that getting that particular Palladio requires learning to effectively apply the Crouch of the Wild Tiger.
Please note that no one's email address should be shared publicly without their permission. Thank you.
The correct mail is [removed by Moderator]
386sky's account has been blocked until further notice for repeated offences and failure to comply with Typophile discussion board regulations.
